minimum-egress-concurrent-connections.description: NSACF can establish more than one concurrent connection to UDSF for better throughput; This field specifies the minimum number of concurrent connections to UDSF; if all the connections are blocked (max concurrent stream reached), further more connections will be opened

max-number-of-ues.description: max number of registered UEs allowed for a network slice

threads.description: Number of concurrent worker threads. If 0 is given: thead number matches number of cores

private-key-file.description: path to private key file in PEM format

cert-file.description: path to cert file in PEM format

caCert-file.description: path to CA cert file in PEM format for client certificate verification, this is used when mTLS is enabled

mTLS.description: true: enable mTLS, request and verify client certificate; false: do not request client certificate

max-concurrent-streams.description: Value of SETTINGS_MAX_CONCURRENT_STREAMS in setting frame; default: 2048

encoder-header-table-size.description: Specify encoder header table size. The decoder (server) specifies the maximum dynamic table size it accepts. Then the negotiated dynamic table size is the minimum of this option value and the value which server specified.

window-bits.description: Sets the stream level initial window size to (2^window-bits)-1

connection-window-bits.description: Sets the connection level initial window size to (2^connection-window-bits)-1

socket-receive-buffer-size.description: socket receive buffer size in bytes; default: 4M

socket-send-buffer-size.description: socket send buffer size in bytes; default: 4M

no-tls-proto.description: Specify ALPN identifier of the protocol to be used for non-TLS connections. Available protocols: h2c and http/1.1

verbose.description: true: print debug trace; false: no debug print
